CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aura Fine Arts relative to Ironwood Gallery?
SRP.A: Aura Fine Arts is {below} Ironwood Gallery in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironwood Gallery relative to The Gilded Frame?
SRP.A: Ironwood Gallery is {below} The Gilded Frame in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironwood Gallery relative to Zenith Sculpture Garden?
SRP.A: Ironwood Gallery is {above} Zenith Sculpture Garden in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total art gallery visitors?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Ironwood Gallery}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total art gallery visitors?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Zenith Sculpture Garden}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Zenith Sculpture Garden's minimum Art Gallery Visitors in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Zenith Sculpture Garden's minimum Art Gallery Visitors is in {1983}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Ironwood Gallery's maximum Art Gallery Visitors in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Ironwood Gallery's maximum Art Gallery Visitors is in {1995}.

NC.Q: Between 1994 and 1996, did the total Art Gallery Visitors experience a larger or smaller change than between 1972 and 1978?
NC.A: The change in total art gallery visitors between 1994 and 1996 was {smaller} than between 1972 and 1978.

NC.Q: Between 1971 and 1991, did the total Art Gallery Visitors experience a larger or smaller change than between 1986 and 1990?
NC.A: The change in total art gallery visitors between 1971 and 1991 was {larger} than between 1986 and 1990.

NC.Q: Was the total Art Gallery Visitors in 1992 higher or lower than in 1995?
NC.A: The total art gallery visitors in 1992 was {lower} than in 1995.

NC.Q: Between 1982 and 1993, did the total Art Gallery Visitors experience a larger or smaller change than between 1971 and 1986?
NC.A: The change in total art gallery visitors between 1982 and 1993 was {smaller} than between 1971 and 1986.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Ironwood Gallery} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did The Gilded Frame and Ironwood Gallery first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: The Gilded Frame and Ironwood Gallery first exchanged leading positions in {1969}.
